import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { AppBar, Toolbar, Button, useScrollTrigger, Slide, CssBaseline } from '@mui/material'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import logo from '../assets/logo.svg'; import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; import Typed from "typed.js"; // CSS for the fixed navigation bar const appBarStyles = { position: 'static', backgroundColor: 'white', boxShadow: '0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)', }; // CSS for the scrolled navigation bar const scrolledAppBarStyles = { backgroundColor: 'white', boxShadow: '0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)', }; function HideOnScroll(props) { const { children, window } = props; const trigger = useScrollTrigger({ target: window ? window() : undefined, }); return ( {children} ); } const AboutUs = () => { const el = useRef(null); const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { if (window.scrollY > 10) { setScrolled(true); } else { setScrolled(false); } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }; }, []); // Calculate the target date and time for the countdown return (
